reviewText: It is impressive to witness Mathis technique and style remains ellegant and fresh after so many years. Here you'll find live renditions of all-time Mathis' greatest hits besides some great performances he has recorded but rarely sings in his shows. Some listeners are very critic of Johnny Mathis exageratedly sweetened and romantic approach to songs and of his excessive vibrato and high top notes next to soprano voices. OK, OK ... but no listener can deny Mathis leaves a legacy of stylish to the art of singing GAS. Live by Request is a live presentation of an artist as requested by on-line phone call audience and this show formula seems rather false because orchestra and performer always show perfectly engaged to promptly perform every song asked. Referring to Mathis shows on video, I think it is time for Mathis to create new programs than that obvious and repetitive greatest hit collection. "Chances are" is another video collection on the same repertoire basis.
summary: The impressively untouched Mathis formula shows on video

reviewText: This is the show that was on the A&E network only it's much better on Dvd.The picture is very sharp.The colors are brillent.This dvd makes it fill like Johnny Mathis is performing in concert for you.Johnny Mathis takes music request from viewers that call in.This dvd also contains bonus footage from Johnny Mathis such as promos,radio interviews and song access.Also the sound is in surround.Johnny Mathis fans can't go wrong with this one.This one rates up there with Tony Bennett's live by request which I also have.I hope sony will release Johnny Mathis other 3 videoes on Dvd.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I don't own this DVD but had the pleasure of seeing it on my local PBS TV station and it was a real treat. Johnny Mathis is my favorite singer in the world, he is also one of my role models. He lives his life by a set of standards that our society needs to get back too. I've loved this man since I first heard him sing Misty way back in 1959 and I've been following his career and collecting his music since then too. I plan to buy this DVD because it shows Johnny the way he really is, he's a stand up guy, outstanding human being, fantastic performer and he chose to share it with us. Maybe some day he'll understand why we fans love and admire him so much, what is not to love and admire? I hope we have him for many, many years to come.
Title: N/A

reviewText: "Johnny Mathis - Live..."! is a must have! A few superlatives to start include Interactive, Conversational & Mathis from Wonderful! Wonderful! to Brazil! This is a intimate studio masterpiece! Also, you will find a very special duet with Deniece Williams and two favorites with Gil Reigers!In my on-going appreciation of Johnny Mathis, I have seen him perform in many vocal scenarios. "Johnny Mathis - Live..." refreshed and added to the total professional artist that he is!$$$>>>Johnny Mathis - Live by RequestInvest in one for your viewing and listening pleasure! Give & Share with everyone you know. They will thank you. You see it was a gift to me...Enjoy!...Michael.
summary: "Johnny Mathis - Live..."! - Another Jewel for your Mathis treasure!

reviewText: I received this today and I've played in three times already. I've seen Johnny in person several times but he hasn't been in my area lately, so I needed a Johnny "fix." Thankfully, this DVD did not disappoint me. It's wonderful......of course, not as wonderful, wonderful as Johnny in person, but worth every minute of it.
summary: The next best thing to seeing Johnny in person......
